pageContext.title: In brief: Hiring platform JobHop raises $710k in seed funding
pageContext.content:
JobHop, a Singapore-registered recruitment matchmaker, has raised a US$710,000 seed round from KK Fund and Mynavi Corporation, one of the leading companies in Japan’s HR sector. Some angel investors also participated in the round. The funding will be used to grow the team and evolve JobHop’s platform to support increasing client demand. Since its founding in 2016, the company’s matching algorithm with a built-in applicant tracking system has served over 500,000 jobseekers and 2,000 small to large enterprises hiring in Vietnam.

Source: Press release
